casebody.data:
ZLOOP, INC.
v.
PARKER POE ADAMS & BERNSTEIN LLP, et al. 122PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 19, 2018 Gavin J. Reardon, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Amiel J. Rossabi, Attorney at Law, for Zloop, INC. Robert W. Fuller, Attorney at Law, Stuart L. Pratt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Parker Poe Adams & Bernstein, LLP, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of October 2018 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of October 2018."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 11th day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
